published_attributes.title: Short guide
published_attributes.serialized_body:
Click play in the embedded window below to get a short tour on Leader's Onboarding Program.

To get most out of it enlarge the window by clicking "..." in the bottom right.

Once you finish, click the "Continue" button below, at the bottom of the Bridge app.

published_attributes.title: FAQ
published_attributes.serialized_body:
Can I check my attendance in the programme if I lose track?

Yes, you can check your attendance program by checking Program’s Bridge Page here.

What to do if I can't participate in a session?

If you already know that you won't be able to participate in a given live session - go to Program’s Bridge Page - find a date and time that suits you best and just reassign yourself to a new date. Should you have any difficulties please reach out to Learning & Development at #leaders_onboarding. 

Do I have to attend all Leader’s Onboarding sessions?

Please treat all e-learnings and live sessions as compulsory and do not skip them. We do have a list of optional learnings - they are listed in a separate program called Leader’s Onboarding - Optional. 

Is it possible to complete the program faster?

Yes, if you would like to complete the programme faster and have the time to participate in more than one session per week, go to Leaders' Onboarding Schedule and Attendance - choose dates and times of sessions that suit you best and reach out to Knowledge and Development on a dedicated Slack channel: #leaders_onboarding - we will invite you to these sessions. 

There are new sessions in the Leaders' Onboarding Program that were unavailable when I started the programme. Can I attend these sessions?

Yes, if you would like to attend a session of your choice, go to Leader’s Onboarding Program Bridge page (here). For live sessions - find the session(s) you would like to attend, choose the date and time and reach out to Learning and Development on a dedicated Slack channel: #leaders_onboarding - we will invite you to these sessions. For e-learnings - find the learning you wish to complete and simply enrol yourself. 

I would like to become a leader one day - what should I do?

That is wonderful news! Please talk to your leader and/or HR BP. If you decide together this is a path worth exploiting they will enrol you into a special path dedicated to Aspiring Leaders. 

There is something wrong with the Leader's Onboarding Bridge page?

If there is any error in the system or you experience any difficulties using Bridge - please contact us on #bridge_support Slack channel. Provide us with as much details as possible, print screens. We will investigate and help you as soon as possible. 

I need some adaptations. Can you support me in the Leaders' Onboarding Programme?

If you need any adaptations (e.g. due to dyslexia, hearing impairment or other), feel free to reach out to the Learning and Development Team. Maintaining full confidentiality, we will contact you to determine what we can do to make our sessions and materials more accessible, and ensure that you can participate fully in the sessions.
